title_cn: 底部有很多忧郁和厄运？

title_cn: 严格的北京纳米管

title_cn: 我们从最近的文献中选择

title_cn: 人数优势

title_cn: 简单电路的流畅方法

title_cn: 质谱变为纳米机械

title: Slim fast
title_cn: 修身快

title_cn: 优于平均水平

title_cn: 粘性但不凌乱

title: How do nanotubes suppress T cells?
title_cn: 纳米管如何抑制T细胞？

title: Evaluation of nanoparticle immunotoxicity
title_cn: 纳米粒子免疫毒性评估
abstract: The pharmaceutical industry is developing increasing numbers of drugs and diagnostics based on nanoparticles, and evaluating the immune response to these diverse formulations has become a challenge for scientists and regulatory agencies alike. An international panel of scientists and representatives from various agencies and companies reviewed the imitations of current tests at a workshop held at the National Cancer Institute in Frederick, Maryland. This article outlines practical strategies for identifying and controlling interferences in common evaluation methods and the implications for regulation.
abstract_cn: 制药行业正在开发越来越多的基于纳米颗粒的药物和诊断剂，评估对这些不同制剂的免疫反应已成为科学家和监管机构的挑战。 在马里兰州弗雷德里克（Frederick）的国家癌症研究所（National Cancer Institute）举办的研讨会上，由国际科学家和来自各个机构和公司的代表组成的国际小组审查了当前测试的仿制品。 本文概述了识别和控制常见评估方法中的干扰的实用策略及其对法规的启示。

title: Nanoscale shape-memory alloys for ultrahigh mechanical damping
title_cn: 用于超高机械阻尼的纳米级形状记忆合金
abstract: Shape memory alloys undergo reversible transformations between two distinct phases in response to changes in temperature or applied stress. The creation and motion of the internal interfaces between these phases during such transformations dissipates energy, making these alloys effective mechanical damping materials. Although it has been shown that reversible phase transformations can occur in nanoscale volumes, it is not known whether these transformations have a sample size dependence. Here, we demonstrate that the two phases responsible for shape memory in Cu–Al–Ni alloys are more stable in nanoscale pillars than they are in the bulk. As a result, the pillars show a damping figure of merit that is substantially higher than any previously reported value for a bulk material, making them attractive for damping applications in nanoscale and microscale devices.
abstract_cn: 形状记忆合金响应温度或施加的应力变化，在两个不同的相之间经历可逆转变。 在这种转变过程中，这些相之间的内部界面的产生和运动会耗散能量，从而使这些合金成为有效的机械阻尼材料。 尽管已经显示出可逆相变可以在纳米级体积中发生，但尚不清楚这些相变是否与样品量有关。 在这里，我们证明了纳米级柱体中Cu＆＃8211; Al＆＃8211; Ni合金中负责形状记忆的两个相比整体中更稳定。 结果，支柱显示出的阻尼品质因数大大高于先前报道的散装材料的任何值，使其对于纳米级和微米级设备的阻尼应用具有吸引力。

title: New aspects of the metal–insulator transition in single-domain vanadium dioxide nanobeams
title_cn: 单畴二氧化钒纳米束中金属-绝缘体转变的新方面
abstract: Many strongly correlated electronic materials have a domain structure that greatly influences the bulk properties and obscures the fundamental properties of the homogeneous material. Nanoscale samples, on the other hand, can be smaller than the characteristic domain size, thus making it possible to explore these fundamental properties in detail. Here, we report new aspects of the metal–insulator transition, studied in single-domain vanadium dioxide nanobeams. We have observed supercooling of the metallic phase by 50 °C, an activation energy in the insulating phase that is consistent with the optical gap, and a connection between the metal–insulator transition and the equilibrium carrier density in the insulating phase. Our devices also provide a nanomechanical method for determining the transition temperature, enable measurements on individual metal–insulator interphase walls to be made, and allow general investigations of phase transitions in quasi-one-dimensional geometries.
abstract_cn: 许多高度相关的电子材料具有畴结构，该结构极大地影响了整体性能，并掩盖了均质材料的基本性能。另一方面，纳米级样品可以小于特征域尺寸，因此可以详细研究这些基本特性。在这里，我们报告了在单域二氧化钒纳米束中研究的金属绝缘体转变的新方面。我们已经观察到金属相过50°C过冷，绝缘相中与光隙一致的活化能以及金属-绝缘体转变和平衡载流子密度之间的联系在绝缘阶段。我们的设备还提供了用于确定转变温度的纳米力学方法，可以对单个金属绝缘体的相间壁进行测量，并可以对准一维几何形状中的相变进行一般性研究。

title: Observation of the triplet exciton in EuS-coated single-walled nanotubes
title_cn: EuS包覆单壁纳米管中三重态激子的观察
abstract: Photon absorption by carbon nanotubes creates bound electron–hole pairs called excitons, which can exist in spin-polarized triplet or spin-unpolarized singlet configurations. Triplet excitons are optically inactive owing to the weak spin–orbit coupling in nanotubes. This prevents the optical injection of electron spin into nanotubes for spintronic applications and limits the efficiency of photocurrent generation. Here, we show that it is possible to optically excite the triplet exciton by using a ferromagnetic semiconductor as a spin filter to mix the singlet and triplet excitons. The triplet contribution to the photocurrent is detected, representing the first direct evidence of the triplet exciton in carbon nanotubes.
abstract_cn: 碳纳米管对光子的吸收会产生被称为激子的束缚电子空穴对，该空穴对可以自旋极化三重态或自旋非极化单重态结构存在。 由于纳米管中弱的自旋轨道耦合，三重态激子是光学惰性的。 这防止了将电子自旋光学注入到自旋电子学应用的纳米管中，并限制了光电流产生的效率。 在这里，我们表明可以通过使用铁磁半导体作为自旋滤波器来混合单重态和三重态激子来激发三重态激子。 检测到三重态对光电流的贡献，这是碳纳米管中三重态激子的第一个直接证据。</ p>

title: Multifunctional nanoarchitectures from DNA-based ABC monomers
title_cn: 基于DNA的ABC单体的多功能纳米结构
abstract: The ability to attach different functional moieties to a molecular building block could lead to applications in nanoelectronics, nanophotonics, intelligent sensing and drug delivery. The building unit needs to be both multivalent and anisotropic, and although many anisotropic building blocks have been created, these have not been universally applicable. Recently, DNA has been used to generate various nanostructures or hybrid systems, and as a generic building block for various applications. Here, we report the creation of anisotropic, branched and crosslinkable building blocks (ABC monomers) from which multifunctional nanoarchitectures have been assembled. In particular, we demonstrate a target-driven polymerization process in which polymers are generated only in the presence of a specific DNA molecule, leading to highly sensitive pathogen detection. Using this monomer system, we have also designed a biocompatible nanovector that delivers both drugs and tracers simultaneously. Our approach provides a general yet versatile route towards the creation of a range of multifunctional nanoarchitectures.
abstract_cn: 将不同功能部分连接到分子构件的能力可能会导致在纳米电子学，纳米光子学，智能传感和药物输送中的应用。该构建单元必须既是多价的又是各向异性的，尽管已经创建了许多各向异性的构建基块，但是这些构建基块并没有普遍适用。最近，DNA已用于生成各种纳米结构或杂化系统，并作为各种应用的通用构件。在这里，我们报告了各向异性，支化和可交联的结构单元（ABC单体）的创建，这些组件已从中组装了多功能纳米结构。特别是，我们证明了目标驱动的聚合过程，其中仅在存在特定DNA分子的情况下才生成聚合物，从而导致高度敏感的病原体检测。使用该单体系统，我们还设计了一种生物相容性纳米载体，可同时递送药物和示踪剂。我们的方法为创建一系列多功能纳米体系结构提供了一条通用而通用的途径。

title: Droplet networks with incorporated protein diodes show collective properties
title_cn: 带有蛋白二极管的液滴网络显示出集体的特性
abstract: Recently, we demonstrated that submicrolitre aqueous droplets submerged in an apolar liquid containing lipid can be tightly connected by means of lipid bilayers to form networks. Droplet interface bilayers have been used for rapid screening of membrane proteins and to form asymmetric bilayers with which to examine the fundamental properties of channels and pores. Networks, meanwhile, have been used to form microscale batteries and to detect light. Here, we develop an engineered protein pore with diode-like properties that can be incorporated into droplet interface bilayers in droplet networks to form devices with electrical properties including those of a current limiter, a half-wave rectifier and a full-wave rectifier. The droplet approach, which uses unsophisticated components (oil, lipid, salt water and a simple pore), can therefore be used to create multidroplet networks with collective properties that cannot be produced by droplet pairs.
abstract_cn: 最近，我们证明了浸没在含有脂质的非极性液体中的亚微升水珠可以通过脂质双层紧密连接形成网络。 液滴界面双层已用于快速筛选膜蛋白并形成不对称双层，用于检查通道和孔的基本特性。 同时，网络已被用于形成微型电池和检测光。 在这里，我们开发了一种具有类似二极管特性的工程蛋白孔，可以将其结合到液滴网络中的液滴界面双层中，从而形成具有电性能的器件，包括限流器，半波整流器和全波整流器。 使用不复杂的成分（油，脂质，盐水和简单的孔隙）的液滴方法因此可以用于创建具有液滴对无法产生的集体性质的多液滴网络。

title: Transfer of gold nanoparticles from the water column to the estuarine food web
title_cn: 金纳米颗粒从水柱转移到河口食物网
abstract: Within the next five years the manufacture of large quantities of nanomaterials may lead to unintended contamination of terrestrial and aquatic ecosystems. The unique physical, chemical and electronic properties of nanomaterials allow new modes of interaction with environmental systems that can have unexpected impacts. Here, we show that gold nanorods can readily pass from the water column to the marine food web in three laboratory-constructed estuarine mesocosms containing sea water, sediment, sea grass, microbes, biofilms, snails, clams, shrimp and fish. A single dose of gold nanorods (65 nm length × 15 nm diameter) was added to each mesocosm and their distribution in the aqueous and sediment phases monitored over 12 days. Nanorods partitioned between biofilms, sediments, plants, animals and sea water with a recovery of 84.4%. Clams and biofilms accumulated the most nanoparticles on a per mass basis, suggesting that gold nanorods can readily pass from the water column to the marine food web.
abstract_cn: 在未来五年内，大量纳米材料的制造可能会导致陆生和水生生态系统的意外污染。纳米材料独特的物理，化学和电子特性允许与环境系统发生新的相互作用方式，从而产生意想不到的影响。在这里，我们表明，金纳米棒可以很容易地从水柱传递到三个实验室建造的河口大观中，从海洋中的水网上通过，这些大中观包括海水，沉积物，海草，微生物，生物膜，蜗牛，蛤，虾和鱼。将单剂量的金纳米棒（长度为65纳米，直径为65纳米，直径为15纳米），并在12天中监测其在水相和沉积相中的分布。纳米棒在生物膜，沉积物，植物，动物和海水之间分配，回收率为84.4％。蛤和生物膜按质量计积累的纳米颗粒最多，这表明金纳米棒可以很容易地从水柱传递到海洋食物网。

title: Towards single-molecule nanomechanical mass spectrometry
title_cn: 迈向单分子纳米机械质谱
abstract: Mass spectrometry provides rapid and quantitative identification of protein species with relatively low sample consumption. The trend towards biological analysis at increasingly smaller scales, ultimately down to the volume of an individual cell, continues, and mass spectrometry with a sensitivity of a few to single molecules will be necessary. Nanoelectromechanical systems provide unparalleled mass sensitivity, which is now sufficient for the detection of individual molecular species in real time. Here, we report the first demonstration of mass spectrometry based on single biological molecule detection with a nanoelectromechanical system. In our nanoelectromechanical–mass spectrometry system, nanoparticles and protein species are introduced by electrospray injection from the fluid phase in ambient conditions into vacuum, and are subsequently delivered to the nanoelectromechanical system detector by hexapole ion optics. Precipitous frequency shifts, proportional to the mass, are recorded in real time as analytes adsorb, one by one, onto a phase-locked, ultrahigh-frequency nanoelectromechanical resonator. These first nanoelectromechanical system–mass spectrometry spectra, obtained with modest mass sensitivity from only several hundred mass adsorption events, presage the future capabilities of this approach. We also outline the substantial improvements that are feasible in the near term, some of which are unique to nanoelectromechanical system based-mass spectrometry.
abstract_cn: 质谱法可以相对较低的样品消耗量快速，定量地鉴定蛋白质种类。越来越小规模的生物学分析趋势不断发展，最终缩小到单个细胞的体积，这种趋势仍在继续，对于少数分子对单个分子的敏感性的质谱分析将是必要的。纳米机电系统提供了无与伦比的质量灵敏度，现在足以实时检测单个分子种类。在这里，我们报告了基于具有纳米机电系统的单个生物分子检测的质谱的首次演示。在我们的纳米机电质谱系统中，通过在环境条件下从液相将电喷雾注入纳米颗粒和蛋白质物质到真空中，然后通过六极离子光学将其输送到纳米机电系统检测器中。随着分析物一一吸附到锁相超高频纳米机电谐振器上，实时记录与质量成正比的急剧频移。这些最初的纳米机电系统质谱图仅从数百次质量吸附事件中获得适度的质量灵敏度，预示了该方法的未来功能。我们还概述了在短期内可行的实质性改进，其中一些是基于纳米机电系统的质谱法所独有的。

title: Mechanisms for how inhaled multiwalled carbon nanotubes suppress systemic immune function in mice
title_cn: 吸入式多壁碳纳米管如何抑制小鼠的全身免疫功能的机制
abstract: The potential health effects of inhaling carbon nanotubes are important because of possible exposures in occupational settings. Previously, we have shown mice that have inhaled multiwalled carbon nanotubes have suppressed systemic immune function. Here, we show the mechanisms for this immune suppression. Mice were exposed to 0, 0.3 or 1 mg m−3 multiwalled carbon nanotubes for 6 h per day for 14 consecutive days in whole-body inhalation chambers. Only those exposed to a dose of 1 mg m−3 presented suppressed immune function; this involved activation of cyclooxygenase enzymes in the spleen in response to a signal from the lungs. Spleen cells from exposed animals partially recovered their immune function when treated with ibuprofen, a drug that blocks the formation of cyclooxygenase enzymes. Knockout mice without cyclooxygenase enzymes were not affected when exposed to multiwalled carbon nanotubes, further confirming the importance of this enzyme in suppression. Proteins from the lungs of exposed mice suppressed the immune function of spleen cells from normal mice, but not those from knockout mice. Our findings suggest that signals from the lung can activate signals in the spleen to suppress the immune function of exposed mice.
abstract_cn: 吸入碳纳米管的潜在健康影响非常重要，因为在职业环境中可能接触到碳纳米管。以前，我们已经显示了吸入多壁碳纳米管的小鼠抑制了全身免疫功能。在这里，我们展示了这种免疫抑制的机制。小鼠每天在全身吸入室内连续6天每天暴露于0、0.3或1mg / m3多壁碳纳米管中，持续6h 。只有暴露于1＆＃160; m <sup>＆＃8722; 3 </ sup>剂量的那些人的免疫功能受到抑制；这涉及响应肺部信号而激活脾脏中的环氧合酶。当使用布洛芬（一种阻止环氧合酶的形成的药物）治疗时，来自裸露动物的脾细胞可部分恢复其免疫功能。当暴露于多壁碳纳米管时，没有环氧合酶的敲除小鼠没有受到影响，进一步证实了这种酶在抑制中的重要性。暴露小鼠肺中的蛋白质抑制了正常小鼠脾细胞的免疫功能，但抑制了剔除小鼠的脾细胞的免疫功能。我们的发现表明，来自肺的信号可以激活脾脏中的信号，从而抑制暴露小鼠的免疫功能。</ p>

title: Self-assembled cationic peptide nanoparticles as an efficient antimicrobial agent
title_cn: 自组装阳离子肽纳米颗粒作为有效的抗菌剂
abstract: Antimicrobial cationic peptides are of interest because they can combat multi-drug-resistant microbes. Most peptides form α-helices or β-sheet-like structures that can insert into and subsequently disintegrate negatively charged bacterial cell surfaces. Here, we show that a novel class of core–shell nanoparticles formed by self-assembly of an amphiphilic peptide have strong antimicrobial properties against a range of bacteria, yeasts and fungi. The nanoparticles show a high therapeutic index against Staphylococcus aureus infection in mice and are more potent than their unassembled peptide counterparts. Using Staphylococcus aureus-infected meningitis rabbits, we show that the nanoparticles can cross the blood–brain barrier and suppress bacterial growth in infected brains. Taken together, these nanoparticles are promising antimicrobial agents that can be used to treat brain infections and other infectious diseases.
abstract_cn: 抗菌阳离子肽是令人感兴趣的，因为它们可以抵抗多重耐药微生物。 大多数肽形成可以插入带负电荷的细菌细胞表面并随后分解的带螺旋或带状结构。 在这里，我们显示了通过两亲性肽的自组装形成的一类新型的核壳纳米粒子，对一系列细菌，酵母和真菌具有很强的抗菌性能。 纳米颗粒在小鼠中显示出针对金黄色葡萄球菌感染的高治疗指数，并且比未组装的肽对应物更有效。 使用金黄色葡萄球菌感染的脑膜炎兔，我们显示纳米颗粒可以穿过血脑屏障并抑制受感染的大脑中的细菌生长。 总之，这些纳米粒子是很有前途的抗菌剂，可用于治疗脑部感染和其他传染病。
